directions: In large saucepan set over medium heat, stir together oats, milk, honey, pumpkin pie spice and salt. Bring to boil; reduce heat and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes.
Stir in pumpkin puree and heat through. Divide evenly among 4 bowls; top with dollop of yogurt and sprinkle with pecans.
title: Quaker® Pumpkin Pie Oatmeal
